                            Map valuesMap = new HashMap();
valuesMap.put("code", 1234);
String templateString = "éªŒè¯ç :[code],æ‚¨æ­£åœ¨ç™»å½•ç®¡ç†åå°ï¼Œ5åˆ†é’Ÿå†…è¾“å…¥æœ‰æ•ˆã€‚";

//ä¿®æ”¹å‰ç¼€ã€åç¼€
sub.setVariablePrefix("[");
sub.setVariableSuffix("]");
String content= sub.replace(templateString);
System.out.println(content);

                            2ã€org.springframework.expression

                            
String smsTemplate = "éªŒè¯ç :#{[code]},æ‚¨æ­£åœ¨ç™»å½•ç®¡ç†åå°ï¼Œ5åˆ†é’Ÿå†…è¾“å…¥æœ‰æ•ˆã€‚";

ExpressionParser parser = new SpelExpressionParser();
TemplateParserContext parserContext = new TemplateParserContext();
String content = parser.parseExpression(smsTemplate,parserContext).getValue(params, String.class);

System.out.println(content);
